answerText: Azul [or Blue] [10] Azul is a seminal work of this Nicaraguan poet, the founder of Modernismo and author of Profane Hyms.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Lawrence U and Georgia Tech | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: It inspired two letters from Juan Valera, praising its author as "a prose writer and poet of talent." For 10 points each:   [10] Name this 1888 book of poetry and short stories that contains "El palacio del sol" and "En Chile."
